\rho(x,t+T)=\frac{1}{A(T)}(\rho(x,t)+T/T_{m})

italic-rho OPEN:( italic-x PUNCT:, italic-t ADDOP:plus italic-T CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-rho OPEN:( italic-x PUNCT:, italic-t CLOSE:) ADDOP:plus italic-T MULOP:divide italic-T POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus italic-T MULOP:divide italic-T POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end

Delta italic-rho OPEN:( italic-x PUNCT:, italic-t CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-T ARG:end ARG:start italic-T POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus italic-T ARG:end OPEN:( NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-rho CLOSE:)
\Delta\rho(x,t)=\frac{T}{T_{m}+T}(1-\rho)

italic-rho OPEN:( italic-x PUNCT:, italic-t ADDOP:plus italic-T CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-rho OPEN:( italic-x PUNCT:, italic-t CLOSE:) ADDOP:plus italic-k Delta italic-E MULOP:divide italic-E POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus italic-k Delta italic-E MULOP:divide italic-E POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end

Delta italic-rho OPEN:( italic-x PUNCT:, italic-t CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start Delta italic-E ARG:end ARG:start italic-k italic-E POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus Delta italic-E ARG:end OPEN:( NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-rho CLOSE:)
